oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Men at book sale
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Memphis Public Library & Information Center; books; Main Library;
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Several men looking through the 600s and 700s at the annual book sale. Note on Back: "Another cooperative effort of the library and the Friends group: Book Sales, held twice a year since 1971, have netted over $34,000 for the Friends. The money has provided much needed equipment, plus such 'frills' as paid newspaper advertising, draperies, area carpets, picture framing, potted plants, etc."
